sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"惊吓，惊恐"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: alarm, frighten, startle, terrify, scare, intimidate
means: alarm ：着重指某人意识到危险而突然产生的惊恐。
frighten ：普通用词，使用广泛，指产生突然、短暂的惊慌、恐怖感。
startle ：强调突然使人惊骇或震惊。
terrify ：语气最强，指惊骇得六神无主，魂飞魄散。
scare ：指非正式文体中可与frighten换用，但语气较重，侧重人受惊吓后立即停下正在干的事或跑掉。
intimidate ：特指恐吓某人，迫使其做某事。

sentence.Network_en: Whom would it profit to terrify or to kill James Sinclair?
sentence.Network_cn: 恐吓或者干掉詹姆斯·辛克莱对谁会有好处？

sentence.Network_en: Their movements through the region were calculated to terrify landowners into abandoning their holdings.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们在该地区的行动是精心谋划的，意在恐吓土地所有者放弃手中的地产。

sentence.Network_en: Don't let the title of Kelly's book terrify you.
sentence.Network_cn: 不要被凯利的著作的名称吓到.

“九”句英语闯天下-惊吓九句 _ 上海疯狂英语 ... How awful! 可怕噢！ How terrifying! 吓死人了！ That's scary! 真令人害怕！.
the most terrifying aspect of nuclear bombing is radiation ., 核弹轰炸最可怕的一面是辐射.
the most terrifying aspect of nuclear bombing is radiation ., 核弹轰炸最可怕的一面是辐射.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin terrificare, from terrificus 'frightening' (see terrific)

entry.tran: 吓坏;使极度恐慌;使非常害怕
entry.def: If something terrifies you, it makes you feel extremely frightened.

example.tran: 坐飞机让他害怕得要命。

example.ex: The thought of dying slowly and painfully terrified me.
example.tran: 缓慢而痛苦地死去的想法使我恐惧不已。

auth_sentence.content: The consequences of this terrify me, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: The consequences of this terrify me, he said.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The consequences of this terrify me, he said.

auth_sentence.content: It may terrify her to death.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It may terrify her to death.

auth_sentence.content: You would only terrify, confuse, and alienate anyone you wished to listen.
auth_sentence.res_content: You would only terrify, confuse, and alienate anyone you wished to listen.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You would only terrify, confuse, and alienate anyone you wished to listen.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =earth,表示"土地"; 2. =frighten,可怕,恐惧; 3. =frighten,表示"恐,怕"

stems_affixes.value_cn: [comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
stems_affixes.word_buile: extra外+terrestrial[adj.地球的，地球上的]→adj.[comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的
subterrane[n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室]+ean→adj.地下的
terr土地+estrial→adj.地球的，地球上的
territory[n.领土;版图;领域,范围]+ial……的→territorial领土的
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ent……的→deterrent威慑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很糟的;可怕的,骇人的;极度的,厉害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+ible可..的→可怕的
terr恐,怕+ific产生……的→带来可怕→好到让人可怕的地步→极好的
extra外+territorial[adj.领土的,土地的,地方的]+ity表名词→n.治外法权
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下层; 洞穴, 地下室
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+terr土地+ane→n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室
terr土地+ace→n.平台,阳台,露台
terr土地+ain表名词→n.地势,地形
terr土地+it+ory场所,范围→地的范围,领土
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ment表名词→n.制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+or表名词→n.恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
terror恐怖+ist人→n.恐怖分子
dis离,出+inter埋→v.挖出,掘土
in进+ter=terr土地→v.埋葬
de去+ter=terr恐,怕→吓跑了,吓得不动了
terr恐,怕+ify使……→v.使害怕,使惊恐

Sentence.sentence: He said "Monsanto should not be able, just because they've got billions of dollars to spend on legal fees, to try to terrify farmers into obeying their agreements by massive force and threats.

means.word_mean: 使恐惧, 使十分害怕, 使恐怖, 使惊吓, 恐吓

sentences.en: That sort of thing terrifies people.
sentences.cn: 那样的事令人感到恐怖。

jushi.english: Low-flying aircrafts terrify the wild animals.
jushi.chinese: 低空飞行的飞机使野兽惊恐不安。

jushi.english: That sort of thing terrifies people.
The prospect of nuclear warfare terrifies the population.
jushi.chinese: 核战争的前景使人民感到恐怖。
